attributes.action: Make the testing of CBD Oil a formal priority on the effects it has on Cancer
attributes.background: There are numerous reports and evidence that Cannabis Oil has positive effects on Shrinking or destroying certain cancer cells and i believe that the public should know this by the Government doing Formal tests ASAP.

rejection.details:
We're not sure exactly what you mean by "Make the testing of CBD Oil a formal priority on the effects it has on Cancer". 

If you'd like the Government to fund more research into the possible medical uses of cannabis oil, you could start a new petition asking for that.
